title: Sacred Secrets of Sound
body:
Many have heard: “At first there was the word,” but does this really mean all of existence first sprang from sound? Connecting religions, magic, and quantum physics with ancient knowledge of Egypt, Tibet, native tribes, origin stories of religions, and more, experts across fields use sacred geometry and modern science to analyze humanity’s universal links with sound. 

Discussing evolution and the Big Bang in relation to consciousness, Gregg Braden, William Henry, Billy Carson, Nassim Haramein, Robert Grant, Dr. Theresa Bullard, and others explore the origins of consciousness in our universe regarding vibrations, frequency, and the sounds of creation.
teaser: Many have heard: “At first there was the word,” but does this mean all of existence sprang from sound? Connecting music and quantum physics with ancient knowledge, structures, and theologies, experts use modern science to illustrate the power of sound.

title: Geometry of Sound
body:
What secrets of sound can be revealed through sacred geometry? From the Fibonacci sequence to Platonic solids and snowflakes, examples of sacred geometry as visible representations of frequency are everywhere. 

Experts Dr. Robert Gilbert, Dr. Jeffrey Thompson, Dr. Theresa Bullard, Gregg Braden, Billy Carson, and Kimba Arem explore human innovations of sound from the revolutionary cymatics experiments of Swiss scientist Hans Jenny to mystical instruments stretching across centuries, such as the monochord and the didgeridoo. Spanning time and disciplines, doctors, musicians, and authors agree that sound is as divine as geometry is sacred. Discover the innate links between vibrational structures of sound and frequential patterns of geometry.
teaser: What secrets of sound can be revealed through sacred geometry? From the Fibonacci sequence to Platonic solids and snowflakes, examples of sacred geometry as visible representations of frequency are everywhere.

title: Spectrum of Sound
body: Are emotions vibrating energy in motion? Exploring the Hermetic principles of polarity, rhythm, duality, and more, experts including Gregg Braden, John Beaulieu, Jeff Volk, Nassim Haramein, Dr. Konstantin Korotkov, and others illuminate the links between the frequential nature of our universe and vibrational structures of sound. As science continues to reveal the innate connections between our thoughts and our reality, we can learn how to tune into our harmonious universe through our own vibrations.
teaser: Are emotions vibrating energy in motion? Exploring the Hermetic principles of polarity, rhythm, duality, and more, experts including Gregg Braden, John Beaulieu, Jeff Volk, Nassim Haramein, Dr. Konstantin Korotkov, and others illuminate the links between the frequential nature of our universe and vibrational structures of sound.

title: Consciousness of Sound
body: Is consciousness created from the brain, or do our brains tap into fields of consciousness like a radio dial finding a signal? As Nassim Haramein explains, our brains are like antennas, with our consciousness tapping into a field of information the same way a TV or a radio channels information from elsewhere — the signal is not sourced within the unit, but are coming from elsewhere. Exploring thoughts and intentions in relation to our vibrational reality and projecting frequencies, experts weigh in on how human consciousness can affect our physical world.
teaser: Is consciousness created from the brain, or do our brains tap into fields of consciousness like a radio dial finding a signal? As Nassim Haramein explains, our brains are like antennas, with our consciousness tapping into a field of information the same way a TV or a radio channels information from elsewhere — the signal is not sourced within the unit, but are coming from elsewhere.

title: Sound & Megaliths
body: How was sound used to construct ancient megaliths of Earth? From the manipulation of gravitational fields to the electromagnetic ties of consciousness, professionals agree most ancient megaliths are aligned with “frequency nodes,” much like planetary chakra points. Top researchers and experts weigh in on potential sound technologies used to create structures like The Pyramids of Giza in Egypt, Gobekli Tepe in Turkey, plus Teotihuacan and Chichen Itza in Mexico. Through examinations of these legendary structures, explore the vibrational nature of our universe.
teaser: How was sound used to construct ancient megaliths of Earth? From the manipulation of gravitational fields to the electromagnetic ties of consciousness, professionals agree most ancient megaliths are aligned with “frequency nodes,” much like planetary chakra points. Top researchers and experts weigh in on potential sound technologies used to create structures like The Pyramids of Giza in Egypt, Gobekli Tepe in Turkey, plus Teotihuacan and Chichen Itza in Mexico.

title: Sound Throughout Time
body: What secrets of sound and resonance have been lost to history? Exploring the materials used in megaliths, as well as misunderstood hieroglyphs such as the Egyptian Ankh and figures like Thoth, Hermes, or Moses of the Old Testament of the Bible, experts and researchers reveal evidence of megalithic sites illuminating lost links between energetic nodes of planet Earth.
teaser: What secrets of sound and resonance have been lost to history? Experts explore the materials used in megaliths, as well as misunderstood hieroglyphs such as the Egyptian Ankh and figures like Thoth, Hermes, or Moses of the Old Testament of the Bible.

title: Nature's Harmonics
body: How can we bring ourselves into harmony with the world around us? Experts illuminate how individuals can reconnect with the healing harmonics of nature. Exploring the songs of shamans, tonal alignments of chakras, plant medicines such as Ayahuasca, and the vibrational aspects of nature, scientists to spiritualists agree that each of us have the potential to improve our lives by harmonizing with the natural electromagnetics of our world. By tapping into the universal vibrational spectrum containing all divine powers, humanity can heal through the frequencies and rhythms of our natural world.
teaser: How can we bring ourselves into harmony with the world around us? Experts illuminate how individuals can reconnect with the healing harmonics of nature. Exploring the songs of shamans, tonal alignments of chakras, plant medicines such as Ayahuasca, and the vibrational aspects of nature, scientists to spiritualists agree that each of us have the potential to improve our lives by harmonizing with the natural electromagnetics of our world.

title: Healing With Sound
body: Can sound heal humans through frequencies affecting brainwaves? Exploring breakthrough discoveries in modern science, experts Gregg Braden, Dr. Jeffrey D. Thompson, Dr. Theresa Bullard, Jonathan Goldman and others offer insight into research connecting different vibrations of sound with different brain wavelengths. With EEG scans providing proof of frequencies altering states of consciousness, researchers are finding more correlations between ancient teachings and indigenous rituals with these scientific secrets of sound that could help heal humanity from the inside out.
teaser: Can sound heal humans through frequencies affecting brainwaves? With EEG scans providing proof of frequencies altering states of consciousness, researchers are finding more correlations between ancient teachings and indigenous rituals with these scientific secrets of sound that could help heal humanity from the inside out.

title: Music of the Spheres
body: Could sound hold the hidden keys connecting our universe? Examining frequencies produced in nature from animals to the planets in our solar system, experts explore what missing links we are finding from vibrations. Similarly to how whales, bats, and fish use vibrations to communicate and survive, researchers are utilizing audio technology and the law of octaves to change what pitches humans can perceive in hopes of unlocking these secrets held within sound.
teaser: Could sound hold the hidden keys connecting our universe? Examining frequencies produced in nature from animals to the planets in our solar system, experts explore what missing links we are finding from vibrations.

title: Sound & Spirit
body: Why do we exist and what are we here to accomplish on Earth? The Vedas teach that everything is created out of sound from "om," the primordial reverberation. Exploring how sound can help to accelerate our spiritual evolution, experts and researchers share how different sonic tools can be used to achieve greater coherence in our lives. Finding a sense of harmony within ourselves allows us to connect to nature and link with our true spirit through sound.
teaser: Why do we exist and what are we here to accomplish on Earth? Exploring how sound can help to accelerate our spiritual evolution, experts and researchers share how different sonic tools can be used to achieve greater coherence in our lives.
